text: Michael John Conrad (born July 29, 1933) is a retired United States Army major general who served as Commanding General, 1st Cavalry Division from 1984 to 1986. He graduated from the United States Military Academy in 1956.http://www.westpointaog.org/Page.aspx?pid=1860&chid;=221 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:United States Army generals
title: Michael J. Conrad
